channel.name: Census Events
channel.description:
This channel will attempt to read the submissions from ODK in order, according to the form's collectionDateTime field.
It deals with Census and Update forms in one channel, so that we can process them in the right order.
It attempts to process a few records at a time to avoid memory errors with large form sets.
channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
